Она оптом покупает фрукты и перепродает на местном рынке. В обороте есть товар на сумму 200,000 сом (KGS). Улмасхон обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) для увеличения товара в обороте. Доходы от кредита Улмасхон направит на дальнейшее развитие бизнеса, также хочет накопить на покупку земельного участка.
texts.en: Ulmaskhon is 27 years old, married, and the mother of two children. She has a secondary education. She currently rears animals, grows crops, and sells fruit. Her husband helps her in the business. Ulmaskhon goes about her work very responsibly. Every year she cultivates 0.28 hectares of land, growing potatoes and cucumbers, and she has two sheep on her farmstead. She buys fruit wholesale and sells it on at the local market. Her volume of goods totals 200,000 som (KGS). Ulmaskhon has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to increase her volume of goods. Ulmaskhon will channel the income from the loan to the further development of her business, and she also wants to save up money to buy land.

loans.use: to buy fruits for retail sale and increase her turnover.

loans.name: Martha Luz

texts.es: La señora Martha, tiene 51 años de edad, esta casada, tiene 4 hijos y reside en una aldea que pertenece al municipio del Progreso, Yoro. Doña Martha lleva 9 años de dedicarse a la elaboración y venta de tortillas de maíz. Esta actividad la realiza en su casa, y cuenta con buena clientela.  Ella ha obtenido varios préstamos para mantener el negocio, actualmente solicita otro por 18,000 lempiras para comprar maíz y leña para elaborar tortillas y también para cultivar una parcela de maíz.  Su meta es seguir manteniendo el negocio y mejorar el nivel de vida con su familia.
texts.en:
Martha is 51 years old, is married, has four children, and lives in a village that belongs to the municipality of El Progreso, Yoro.

Martha has been making and selling corn tortillas for nine years now. She works at her home and has a good customer base. 

She has been granted several loans to stay in business. Currently, she is requesting another loan of 18,000 Honduran lempiras (HNL) to buy corn and firewood to make tortillas and also to plant a plot of land with corn. 

Her goal is to stay in business and, together with her family, improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood to make tortillas and also to plant a plot of land with corn.

loans.name: Juan

texts.en:
When Juan and his wife (pictured above to the right of Juan) had their first child, they decided to throw a party, and searched for the perfect supplies to throw a unique event. However, they soon realized that they could develop their own party decorations better than any retail store they visited!

Thus, seven years, ago, Juan and his wife started their own retail supply store for events decorations. As a new company, they have become well known in the decorations field. However, obtaining enough capital to help the business reach its true potential has proven a challenge. 

Originally from Puerto Rico, Juan has the long-term goal of creating a business where he can employ people and expand the business into a franchise. He wants to be recognized in the business environment as one of the first supply options for people throwing events, and create a stable financial environment for himself, his wife, and their three children. 

With the help of this loan, Juan will be able to purchase more inventories (balloons, other equipment), and augment marketing ventures via ads and commercials.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory and equipment for his party supply store, and increase advertising ventures

loans.name: Sofia

texts.en: Sofia is 34 years old and single with no children. She would like to start a small business, selling clothes and elei (dyed material) in her community. In order to do this, Sofia needs a loan to buy a sewing machine, scissors, thread, an unpicker, needles, and other materials. She hopes to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. She has been a member of SPBD since 2013.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, scissors, thread, an unpicker, needles, etc.

loans.name: Silverio Jr.

texts.en:
Silverio is a father of seven children. He has been doing tomato farming for seven years and gets the family’s living from it. For Silverio, it was a good business because he earned an income of PHP 3,000 a month, and it really helps his family.

He decided again to borrow a loan to purchase fertilizer for his tomato plants to make them more productive and have a good harvest.

Silverio’s future plan is to improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for his tomato plants.

loans.name: Agus

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of Ruma’s agents, Agus. Agus lives in Yogyakarta, located about 15 hours' drive or one hour by plane from the national capital of Indonesia, Jakarta. Agus owns a stall that sells mobile airtime credits and provides bill payment services to members of his community. He decided to join Ruma because he wants to learn about how to expand his business using technology. Agus is a friendly and informative mobile provider, which is why he has many customers. 

As the business grows, Agus needs additional capital and is seeking a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits and more bill payment services in his community. Agus’s goal in the near future is to provide an e-commerce business for his community, Ruma’s latest product called Mapan. In the photo, Agus is the one who is holding Ruma’s banner. The one beside him is his friend who helped him to run the business. He is thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to process more prepaid mobile airtime purchases and utility bill payments (like electricity, water, etc) for members of his local community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand her horticulture farm.

loans.name: Ana Lucia

texts.es: Ana esta casada, tiene 35 años de edad, Ana tiene 3 hijos, la niña de 12 años, un joven de 17 años y una niña de 11 años de edad, los 3 estan estudiando. Ana se dedica  atrabajr al jornal juntamente con su esposo y tambien trabajan criando terneros , Ana paga arriendo por la casa en la que vive, Ana tiene bajos recursos economicos y necesita el dinero del credito para comprar terneros, Ana comenta que su hijo de 17 años trabaja ordeñando vacas para asi ayudarse en los gastos de su educacion ya que sus padres no tienen los suficientes ingresos para cubrir los gastos de todas las necesidades del hogar.Ana tiene la aspiracion de seguir trabajndo duro aumentar mas terneros y asi junto a su esposo sacar adelante a sus hijos.
texts.en: Ana is married and 35 years old. She has three children: a 12-year-old daughter, a 17-year-old son, and an 11-year-old daughter. The three are in school. Ana is a day labourer, and so is her husband. They also raise calves. Ana rents their home. She has few economic resources and needs this loan to buy calves. Ana says that her 17-year-old works, caring for cows, to help with his education costs because his parents don't have sufficient income to cover all the household costs. Ana hopes to keep working hard and to increase their number of cattle so that she and her husband can support their children.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en: Evelyn, 36 years old, is married and has seven children. For the past 10 years, Evelyn has been farming rice in the Philippines. She also earns additional income from raising pigs. Evelyn is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to purchase sacks of fertilizer and other farm supplies. She works tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is a repeat client in UGAFODE Microfinance Ltd. She is a married with children. Due to the city hardships, she opted to begin a business but since she had limited capital, she resorted to vending second-hand clothes until she accumulated enough funds to rent a shop.

She also sells second-hand shoes, and she is a resident of Kisasi, Kampala district. She has now applied for a loan of 1,000,000 UGX to buy more of the clothes so that she can boost the business.

She is very grateful for the support UGAFODE Microfinance and Kiva lenders have offered to her.

loans.use: to buy more stock of used clothing to sell

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.en:
Mercedes is a married woman with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Mercedes is 54 years old now.

Mercedes has a business buying and selling boiled eggs in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more eggs for her business.

Mercedes has been in this business for 2 years. In the future, Mercedes would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more eggs for her business

loans.name: Arsenia

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Arsenia works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from coconut wine vending. Arsenia is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell in her market stall for her fish vending business.

Arsenia has been sustaining her business activities through her past 2 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell in her market stall

loans.name: Mariane

texts.en:
Mariane is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 40 years old, and five of her children are currently in school.

Mariane has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell.

Mariane has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell.

loans.name: Nonila

texts.en:
Nonila is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 42 years old, and her five children are in school.

Nonila has a buy-and-sell beverages business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional stock of beverages to sell.

Nonila has been in this business for one year. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of beverages to sell.

loans.name: Alily

texts.en:
Alily, 42, is married and has three children who are still in school.

Alily is in the agricultural business; she fattens pigs in the Philippines. Alily requested a 24000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig.

Alily has been in this business for 10 years now and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca, 57, is married with four children.

Rebecca works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 14000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Rebecca has borrowed and paid 5 loans from NWTF before this one. She has been running the general store for 3 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Rebecca aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Veronica Cristina

texts.es: Cristina es una joven muy alegre, tiene 28 años de edad, Cristina se dedica a atender desde hace 3 años atrás  su negocio que es una tienda y en este mismo lugar vende comidas rapidas, Cristina tiene su negocio familiar con quienes vive que son su madre y una hermana, Cristina nececesita el dinero del credito para  implementar mercaderia en su tienda come es confites y colas, arroz, azucar y mas. Cristina tambien se dedica a trabajar a medio tiempo de empleada domestica. Cristina tiene la aspiracion de seguir trabajando, mejorar su negocio y poner mas variedad en su tienda y de esta madera mejorar la calidad de vida junto a su madre y su hermana.
texts.en: Cristina is a very happy young woman, of 28 years of age. Cristina has made a living by serving for the last 3 years. Her business is a store, and in this same place she sells fast food. Cristina has her family business, and lives with her mother, and a daughter. Cristina needs the loan money to stock food merchandise in her store, such as candy and colas, rice, sugar, and more. Cristina also makes a living as a part time maid. Cristina has the desire to continue working, to improve her business, and to put more variety in her store, and in this manner to improve her quality of life, together with her mother and sister.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, colas among others.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to start farming tea.

loans.name: Madina

texts.ru: Мадина добрая и веселая девушка. Ей 34 года. Мадина с мужем и маленьким ребенком живут в городе Душанбе. Ее муж рабочий строитель. Мадина работает швеей. Она научилась шить 2,5 года назад. Мадина любит свою работу. Она проводит время с удовольствием. Мадина, чтобы улучшить процесс работы и создать себе условия труда решила купить новую швейную машинку. Старая машинка очень старая и предоставляет очень много неудобств. Мадина будет очень счастлива, если ее поддержат. Она не хочет потерять работу, и она всегда выполняет свою работу добросовестно и качественно.
texts.en: Madina is a kind and cheerful young lady. She is 34 years old. Madina lives with her husband and young child in the city of Dushanbe. Her husband is a construction worker. Madina works as a seamstress. She learned how to sew two and a half years ago. Madina likes her work and spends time on it with pleasure. In order to improve her working process and create new working conditions for herself, Madina has decided to buy a new sewing machine. Her old machine is very old and causes a lot of inconvenience. Madina will be very happy if she gets support. She doesn't want to lose work, and she always carries out her work conscientiously and with high quality.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Maria Del Consuelo

texts.es: A sus 52 años de edad Maria esta casada y tiene un hijo que ya es independiente, Maria se dedica  a la crianza de ganado, su esposo se dedica a trabajar al jornal. Maria comenta que tiene una vaca a la que le saca la leche y vende este producto y es asi como obtiene sus ingresos y ayuda a cubrir los gastos del hogar, Maria solicita el credito para invertirlo en la compra de una vaca para asi incrementar su negocio y aumentar  sus ingresos para comprar una casa para ella y su esposo y tener donde pasar su vejez.
texts.en:
At 52 years of age, Maria is married, and has a child, that is already independent. 

Maria makes a living raising cattle. Her husband works for wages. Maria says that she has a cow that she milks, and sells this product, and that is how she earns her income, and helps to cover the household expenses. 

Maria requests the loan to invest in the purchase of a cow to help increase her business, and to increase her income, to buy a house for herself and her husband, where they can spend their old age.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Capac Coya Group

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal CAPAC COYA, el banco está ubicado de el distrito de Coya, provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Justiniano tiene 53 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es casado, el socio alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando en una clínica por la zona, él socio lleva buen tiempo trabajando el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su trabajo, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de una lavadora.
Los socios se sienten agradecidos por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The group member belongs to the CAPAC COYA communal bank, which is situated in the Coya district in the Calca province, department of Cusco. 

Justiniano is 53 years old, has two children and is married. He alternates his daily activities working in a clinic in the area, he has been working for a long time, and it goes well for him thanks to the effort which he puts into his work every day. He is a responsible and persevering person, who wishes to continue working in order to continue supporting his family.

He is asking for a loan to buy a washing machine.

The group members are grateful for the loan and promise to make their repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sunglasses and cosmetics.

loans.name: Abel Fernando

texts.es:
Abel, de 43 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado, no pudo continuar sus estudios debido a los escasos recurso de sus familia, está casado y tiene tres hijos, los cuales están estudiando y su esposa se dedica a las tareas domesticas.

Abel, se dedica a la agricultura y la ganadería desde la edad de 14 años, este oficio lo aprendió con sus padres y sus hermanos mayores, hoy trabaja solo con su esposa y sus hijos.

Able, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agricolas y fertilizantes para sembrar 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz; su trabajo está a 1 kilómetro de distancia desde su casa.

El sueño de Abel, es poder obtener buenas ganancias en sus cultivos, para poder seguir cultivando cada día más.
texts.en:
Abel is 43 years old and has studied through eighth grade. He wasn’t able to continue his studies because of his family’s scarce resources. He is married and has three children, who are studying. His wife is dedicated to household tasks.

Abel has been dedicated to agriculture and livestock since the age of 14. He learned this work from his parents and older siblings. Now, he works by himself with his wife and children. 

Abel needs the loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers to grow 7,000 square meters of corn. His work is 1 kilometer from his house.

Abel’s dream is to be able to have good earnings from his crops so that he can continue growing them everyday in the future.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers to grow 7,000 square meters of corn.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es: Pablo de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el es empleado de una empresa privada desde hace 5 años, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo es como el ha logra salir adelante con su familia, Pablo quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo una muro en el lugar que muestra la fotografía pero como no tiene de suficiente capital está solicitando a INTEGRAL un crédito para la compra de cemento, ladrillos, hierro, arena y pago de mano de obra para que el y su familia puedan vivir más seguros y cómodos.
texts.en:
Pablo, 47 years of age, lives in his own house, with his wife, and his two children. 

He has been employed by a private company for the last 5 years. His work is how he has managed to help his family get ahead. Pablo wants to improve his housing, by building a wall in the place shown in the photograph, but he doesn't have sufficient capital. 

He is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy cement, bricks, iron, sand, and to pay for labor, so that he and his family can live more securely and comfortably.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, iron, sand, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Cristo Salvador Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “Cristo Salvador” conformada por 08 socias emprendedoras y solidarias que con el fruto de sus esfuerzos han ido mejorando. Ángela de 18  años es  separada con 01 hijo de 9 meses de nacido. Ella  se dedica al servicio de costura. Ángela se siente orgullosa porque gracias al préstamo podrá mejorar su calidad de vida. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para la compra de telas e hilos. El deseo de Ángela es de mejorar el negocio. El grupo “Cristo Salvador” agradece a las personas que hicieron posible este crédito. Ángela se encuentra en la parte posterior es la primera del lado derecho viste polo blanco y tiene en brazos a su pequeño hijo.
texts.en: This is the "Cristo Salvador" group, made up of 8 entrepreneurial and supportive women, who have been able to get on as a result of their efforts. Ángela is 18 years old, she is separated and has a nine month old child. She works as a seamstress. She feels pleased as thanks to the loan she will be able to improve her quality of life. The loan she is asking for will be used to buy fabric and thread. Ángela's wish is to improve her business. The "Cristo Salvador" group thanks the people who made this loan possible. Ángela can be seen in the back of the photo, she is the first on the right wearing a white t-shirt and is carrying her small son.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Fiorela

texts.es:
La socia Fiorela se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende pantalones, blusas y polos, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un bazar. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar zapatos, polos, chompas, polos y blusas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Fiorela continues her business selling clothing. She sells pants, shirts, and polo shirts. She already has many years of experience in this business, and it is going well. Her dream is to have a dollar store.

She requests the loan to buy shoes, polo shirts, sweaters, and shirts. 

She is happy for the loan and promises to comply with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy shoes, polo shirts, sweaters, and shirts.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia Gregoria se dedica al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azucar, leche y galletas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azucar, leche y galletas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Gregoria is dedicated to her grocery store business. She sells basic products, such as rice, sugar, milk, and cookies. She works form 8:00am until 7:00pm. She has 5 years of experience in this business, and it is going very well. Her dream is to grow the grocery store business.

She requests the loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cookies.

She is happy with the loan and promises to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cookies.

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia labors a lot to feed her five children. She cultivates her agricultural land in Mahayag and earns well for more than two decades. 

In 2011, Letecia signed up her membership with the Cooperative for access of capitalization. Now, she applied for another loan to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer. 

Letecia has high hopes to have a good harvest for this cropping season.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio César tiene 25 años de edad, es casado, vive en casa familiar con su madre y su cónyuge en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú. Los habitantes de esta zona se dedican principalmente al comercio, agricultura y ganadería.

El se dedica a la cría y venta de animales menores como cerdos, patos y gallinas, desde hace más de 03 años. Cuenta con clientela fija quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El destino del préstamo será para invertir en la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para su negocio así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos, de esta manera Julio César espera poder obtener mayores ingresos los cuales le permitirán mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Julio César is 25 years old and is married. He lives in his family’s house with his mother and his spouse in the district of Cayaltí in the province of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. The residents of this area are mainly dedicated to business, agriculture, and livestock.

He has been dedicated to raising and selling small animals, such as pigs, ducks, and hens, for more than 3 years. He has fixed clients, who offer him good personal and professional references. 

The loan will be used to invest in buying more animals for his business, as well as in buying balanced food to fatten the animals. In this way, Julio César hopes to be able to earn a better income, which will allow him to improve the quality of his and his family’s life.

loans.use: to invest in buying more animals for his business, as well as in buying balanced food to fatten the animals.

loans.name: Marcelita

texts.en:
Marcelita is a married woman with three children. Marcelita is 31 years old and has three children who are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Marcelita has a buy-and-sell dry goods business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 4 years. She requested a PHP 15.000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stocks of dry goods to sell.

In the future, Marcelita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of dry goods to sell

loans.name: Rene

texts.en:
Rene is a married woman with one child. She is 32 years old now.

Rene has a buy-and-sell mineral water business in the Philippines and she has requested a PHP 5,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase additional containers of mineral water to sell.

Rene has been in this business for one year. In the future, she would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional containers of mineral water to sell.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Maricel works hard to support her family.

She has a manufacturing business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from raising pigs. Maricel is borrowing PHP 27,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy materials for her business, such as wood, nails, and varnish.

Maricel has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials for her business, such as wood, nails, and varnish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy thread for making traditional clothing.

loans.name: Ana Rosibel

texts.es:
Ana, de 25 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado, está acompañada y tiene un hijo de 7 años de edad.

Ana, tiene un pequeño negocio de ropa desde hace 4 años, hasta el momento es uno de los principales ingresos que tiene.

Ana, necesita el crédito para comprar ropa para damas y caballeros y así poder mejorar los ingresos de la familia. 

Los sueños de Ana, son mejorar su negocio y poder emplear a otras personas, para que puedan mejorar su calidad de vida tambien.
texts.en:
Ana is 25 years old and studied through fifth grade. She is in a relationship and has a 7-year-old son.

Ana has had a small clothing business for 4 years. At the moment, it is one of her main sources of income.

Ana needs the loan to buy clothing for women and men, so that she can improve her family’s income.

Ana’s dreams are to improve her business and to employ other people in the business, so that she can improve their quality of life as well.

loans.use: to buy clothing for women and men.

loans.name: Sen

texts.en:
Sen is a 53-year-old mother of five children; two of them are dependent children and only one is in school. Sen lives in a rural area of Battambang province. 

The source of her family’s income is from rice farming for fifteen years and fishing is the source of earning more income to support her family. 

This is the first loan for her with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She applies for this loan in order to make a fish pond. 

She hopes that she can earn more income and have the ability to send her children to school.

loans.use: to make a fish pond

loans.name: Reina De La Paz

texts.es: Reina de de 64 años de edad es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de pescado frescos desde hace 25 años, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda repellando las paredes pero como no tiene de suficiente capital esta solicitando a INTEGRAL un crédito para comprara los materiales necesarios como arena, cemento, etc. y pago de mano de obra y asi pueda tener su casa como siempre ha querido.
texts.en:
Reina is 64 years old. She is a very hard-working woman. She lives in her own house with her family. She has been dedicated to selling fresh fish for 25 years. With her sales, she succeeds in covering some of the household expenses. 

She wants to improve her home by plastering the walls, but as she doesn’t have enough capital, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy the necessary materials, which include sand, cement, etc. and workers. In this way, she will be able to have her home be as she has always wanted it.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, etc. and to pay workers.

loans.name: Liliana Marisela

texts.es:
Liliana Marisela tiene 27 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Zaña, una comunidad ubicada cerca al valle del río Jequetepeque, lo que le ha permitido desarrollarse mediante la agricultura, también se dedican al comercio, y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la enseñanza de actividades deportivas en su propio hogar desde hace 02 años aproximadamente y por la zona y alrededores de su distrito, es una joven emprendedora, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa para la compra de una máquina para ejercicios de piernas y de esta manera poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos que le van a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Liliana Marisela is 27 years old. She lives in the Zaña district, a community located near the valley of Jequetepeque River. This location has allowed the community to develop through agriculture, trade and livestock farming. It is located in the province of Chiclayo, belonging to the Lambayeque Region on the north coast of Peru.

She has been dedicated to teaching athletic activities in her own home for about 2 years through her area and around the district. She is an enterprising young woman. 

She is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa to buy a machine to exercise the legs. In this way, she will be able to offer better service to her clients, which will generate a better income for her. This will allow her to improve the quality of her and her family’s life.

loans.use: to buy a machine to exercise the legs.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LLANKACHINAPAC DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Virginia se dedica al negocio de venta de golosinas, la socia vende chupetes, chicles y galletas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 4 años en este negocio y el va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de golosinas. La socia solicita el credito para comprar chupetes, galletas y chicles.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Llankachinapac de Urubamba” communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Urubamba, belonging to the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco. 

Virginia is dedicated to her business selling sweets. She sells lollipops, gum, and cookies. She works from 8:00am until 6:00pm. She already has 4 years of experience in this business, and it is going very well. Her dream is to grow her business selling sweets. 

She requests the loan to buy lollipops, gum, and cookies.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy lollipops, gum, and cookies.

loans.name: Alex

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LLANKACHINAPAC DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio Alex se dedica al negocio de venta de materiales agricolas, el socio vende fertilizantes, semillas y abonos para las tierras de cultivos, el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m.el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de venta de materiales agrícolas. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes y semillas.


El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Llankachinapac de Urubamba” communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Urubamba, belonging to the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.

Alex is dedicated to his business selling agricultural supplies. He sells fertilizers, seeds, and manure for farmland. He works from 8:00am until 7:00pm. His dream is to grow the business selling agricultural supplies. 

He requests the loan to buy fertilizers and seeds.

He is happy for the loan and promises to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds.

loans.name: Santos Eugenio

texts.es:
Santos tiene 41 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos, vive en casa propia de material rústico en la parte rural del distrito de Pucará, una comunidad dedicada a la agricultura y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado caprino, cuenta con 5 años dedicándose a este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El destino del crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de ganado caprino así como alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos, lo que le generará mayores ingresos y así podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Santos is 41 years old and has 3 children. He lives in his own home—made of rustic materials—in the rural part of the Pucará district, in a community dedicated to agriculture and livestock. The community is located in the province of Jaén, in the region of Cajamarca, in the northern mountains of Peru.

He has been dedicated to raising and selling goats for 5 years, and he has good personal and professional references in his district. 

The loan will be used to buy more goats, as well as balanced food to fatten the goats. This will generate more income, and thus, he will be able to improve his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more goats, as well as balanced food to fatten the goats.

loans.name: Rina

texts.en:
Rina is 39 years old and married with two children. With two children in school, Rina works very hard to provide for them.

Rina runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like beverages, canned goods, home care products, and other groceries.

Rina has been in this business for 1 year now. 

In the future, Rina would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like beverages, canned goods, home care products, and other groceries

loans.name: Rosa Mabel

texts.es:
Mabel, de 44 años de edad, es madre soltera, estudio hasta octvao grado, vive junto a su hijo de 15 años de edad.

Mabel, se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace dos años, de las ganancias de este negocio mantiene a su familia.

Mabel, necesita el préstamo para comprar ropa y surtir su negocio.

El sueño de Mabel, es mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mabel, 44 years of age, is a single mother. She went to school until 8th grade. She lives together with her 15 year old child. 

Mabel has made a living selling clothing for the last two years. The earnings from this business support her family.

Mabel needs the loan to buy clothing and stock her business. 

Mabel's dream is to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing and stock her business.

loans.name: Sarey's Group

texts.en:
Sarey, 53, is a mother of six children, one of whom is a dependent child, and they live in Ek Phnom district of Battambang province. 

The sources of her family’s income are rice farming, potato farming, and working for another farm for more than ten years. She can earn about 33,000 KHR per day. 

Sarey has been with VisionFund for seven cycles already and completely repaid the loan. Now she is leading the group of four to apply for this loan with the portion to buy farming supplies to do the farming. 

She hopes that she can gain a higher yield and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies to do the farming

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
Víctor  es un hombre  que trabaja de sol  a sol para darle lo mejor a su familia es un hombre de 47 años de edad, él cuenta que con el crédito anterior le fue muy bien pues logro compra sus semillas de cebolla y también logro comprar sus  fertilizantes, gracias a dios le fue muy bien con la cosecha porque logro venderlo a un buen precio  en la plaza, pero él ahora quiere cultivar unas cuerdas de papas  pero no cuenta con el capital para comprar sus semillas de papa y fertilizantes por tal motivo solicita un nuevo crédito.
Víctor sueña con poder mejorar más sus ingresos para construir su casa.
texts.en:
Víctor is a man who works from dusk until dawn to give the best to his family. He is a 47-year-old man. He says that the previous loan went very well, since he succeeded in buying onion seeds and fertilizers. Thanks to God, the harvest went very well, because he succeeded in selling it at a good price in the plaza. 

However, now he wants to grow some plots of potatoes, but he doesn’t have the capital to buy the potato seeds and fertilizers. Because of this, he requests a new loan.

Víctor dreams of being able to improve his income more so that he can build his house.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy manure, seeds, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Maria De La Flor Doris

texts.es:
Maria de la Flor Doris tiene 41 años de edad, es madre soltera, con un hijo a su cargo, vive en casa familiar en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Ella se dedica a la venta de ceviche en su domicilio, realiza esta actividad desde hace 3 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias por parte de los pobladores de su distrito. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de insumos como pescado, papas, cebolla, etc. para preparar sus alimentos, esto con la finalidad de incrementar su negocio y satifacer las necesidades de sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria de la Flor Doris is 41 years old and is a single mother with a son in her care. She lives in her family’s house in a rural area in the district of Oyotún, in the province of Chiclayo, in the region of Lambayeque, on the norther coast of Peru. Her community is dedicated mainly to agriculture, livestock, and business.

She is dedicated to selling ceviche from her home. She has been doing this for 3 years, so she has experience in the work and has good references from the people of her district. 

She requests the loan to buy more supplies, including fish, potatoes, onions, etc. to make her food. She does this with the goal of growing her business and satisfying her clients’ needs. This will earn her a better income, which will improve the quality of her and her family’s life.

loans.use: to buy more supplies, including fish, potatoes, onions, etc. to make her food.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es:
Andres tiene 42 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería y se ubica en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicios agrícolas como peón, realiza esta actividad desde hace 10 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. Solicita préstamo para la compra de un toro para implementar su negocio de arado de tierra, esto le ayudará para brindar un mejor servicio y satifacer las necesidades de sus clientes, lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Andres is 42 years old and is in a relationship. He lives in his own house with his three children in the rural part of the district of Oyotún. His community is dedicated to agriculture, business, and livestock, and is located in the province of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

He has been dedicated to offering agricultural services as a worker for 10 years. Because of this, he has experience in this business and has good personal and professional references in his district. 

He requests a loan to buy a bull to help with his work of plowing the land. This will help him offer a better service and satisfy his clients’ needs, which will earn him a better income and, thus, improve the quality of his and his family’s life.

loans.use: to buy a bull to help with his work of plowing the land.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma works hard to help provide for her family, especially for the needs of her children. For the past 14 years, she has run her own “sari-sari,” or variety store, and has made a good living doing so.

Gemma has taken out and successfully repaid previous loans for her business through CCT. To improve sales, she is applying for a 20,000 PHP loan to buy additional quantities and varieties of grocery items, toiletries and beverages to sell.

Gemma hopes to improve her business and manage her own manpower so she could better provide for the educational needs of her children. She sincerely wishes to give you heartfelt thanks and appreciation for any assistance in advance.

All CCT community clients, including Gemma, are organized into fellowship groups of 15 to 30 members who meet on a weekly basis. There they share stories of their work, repay microfinance loans and draw strength and inspiration from their study of the Word of God.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario, 49, is married and has six children, three of whom are in school. For the past five years she has been working hard making and selling ice cream in the Philippines.

Rosario has applied for a 10,000 PHP loan through Kiva’s partner NWTF to buy more ice cream ingredients. She is saving up to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more ice cream ingredients.

loans.name: Josefa Maria

texts.es:
Más de 7 años tiene Josefa de haber iniciado su negocio de cafetería, el comienzo no fue fácil pues empezó con una caseta vendiendo fritanga y luego con las ganancias evolucionó a un cafetín. Ahora es un negocio estable y próspero que tiene mucha clientela. 
Por ello, solicita un crédito para comprar  gaseosas, repostería, golosinas, café, etc. Esto le será de mucha ayuda porque podrá ofrecer mayor variedad y calidad en sus productos. Entre los planes de Josefa esta ampliar la infraestructura de su local y generar más ganancias.
texts.en:
It has been more than 7 years since Josefa started her café business. The beginning was not easy since she started with a basket, selling fried food. Later, with her earnings, this turned into a café. Now, she has a stable and prosperous business, which has many clients.

She requests a loan to buy sodas, pastries, sweets, coffee, etc. This will be a big help because she will be able to offer more variety and better quality in her products. 

Among Josefa’s plans is to grow the infrastructure in her location and to generate more earnings.

loans.use: to buy sodas, pastries, sweets, coffee, etc.

loans.name: Isaias

texts.es:
Isaias, de 23 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, está casado, su esposa estudio hasta bachillerato y se dedica a las tareas domesticas, juntos tienen una bebe de dos meses de nacida.

Isaias, actualmente se dedica a la agricultura, puesto que ese fue el oficio que aprendió desde muy joven; pero también se dedica a la comercialización de pan, se dedicó a este otro trabajo porque habia escaces de trabajo en la agricultura; su lugar de trabajo está a tres kilómetros de su hogar.

Con el crédito que está solicitando Isaias, pretende cultivar 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, especificamente  comprará dos sacos de abono, semilla, pagara alquiler de la tierra y pagara mano de obra.

El sueño de Isaias, es poder ampliar más el negocio de venta de pan y tiene fe que lo lograra con la ganancia que obtenga de sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Isaias is 23 years old. He studied until the third grade. He is married. His wife studied until high school and takes care of the household chores. They have a two month old baby.

Isaias is currently working in agriculture as that was the work that he learned when he was very young. He also works selling bread, dedicating himself to this other work because of the scarcity of work in agriculture. His workplace is three miles from his home. 

Isaias will use the loan he is asking for to cultivate 14,000 square meters of corn. Specifically he will buy two bags of fertilizer, seed, and he will pay the rent for the land and pay laborers.

His dream is to be able to expand the business of selling bread and he has faith that he will manage it with profits obtained from his crops.

loans.use: to buy two bags of fertilizer, seed, and to pay rent for the land and pay laborers.

loans.name: María Ester

texts.es:
Ester, de 38 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, está acompañada y vive con su pareja y sus 4 hijos, de los cuales solo dos estudian.

Ester, tiene tres años de trabajar como empleada domestica, de esa manera ella cubre algunas necesidades de su casa.

Ella necesita el préstamo para comprar arena, cemento, lamina, entre otros más para mejorar su vivienda.

El sueño de Ester, es mejor la calidad de vida para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Ester is 38 years old, she didn't have the opportunity to study.  She has a partner and lives with him and their four children of whom only two study.

Ester has three years working as a domestic employee, this is how she covers some of her expenses at home.  She needs the loan to buy sand, concrete, metal and other materials to make improvements to her residence.  

Ester’s dream is to improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sand, concrete, metal and other materials to make improvements to her residence.

loans.name: Nelson Alexander

texts.es:
Nelson, de 30 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está acompañado, vive junto a su pareja y sus 2 hijos de 8 y 3 años de edad.

Nelson, trabaja como panadero desde hace tres años, de ese trabajo ha mantenido a su familia hasta el momento.

Está solicitando un crédito para comprar arena, cemento, lamina y otros materiales para mejorar su vivienda.

El sueño de Nelson, es tener un mejor nivel de vida, tanto para él como para su familia.
texts.en:
Nelson is 30 years old and studied up until his baccalaureate. He lives with his partner and his two children who are 8 and 3 years old.

Nelson has been working as a baker for three years and with this he has supported his family up until now.

He is asking for loan to buy sand, cement, corrugated metal sheets and other materials to improve his home.

His dream is to have a better standard of living, for him as well as his for his family.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, corrugated metal sheets and other material to improve his home.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La socia Maria se sigue dedicando al negocio de ganadería y también la socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de chicha, la socia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que por medio de estos pequeños negocios  quiere sacar adelante a su familia. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar ganado.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member, María, continues working on her livestock business and she also continues with her business selling chichi (a Peruvian drink). The member is an entrepreneurial and hardworking woman that through small businesses wants to get her family ahead.  She requests a loan to buy cattle.  

She is happy for the loan and commits to make the repayments.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Phượng

texts.en:
Mrs Phượng operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish.

Phượng is 30 years old and is married with two children. She lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2015, Phượng joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.
She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main hardship that Phượng faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Phượng hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: 030602120002.thiệu Nguyên Group

texts.en:
Mrs Duyên has a retail business selling cattle feed. She is requesting a loan to purchase additional cattle feed to resell.

Duyên is 58 years old and she is married with three children.
Duyên is the group leader of the 030602120002.Thiệu Nguyên solidarity group, which consists of three members.
She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2009, Duyên joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.
Duyên has been involved in this business for 6 years.
The main hardship that she faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Duyên hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase cattle feed to resell.

loans.name: Nhóm 01 Thôn 2 Quảng Lưu Group

texts.en:
Mrs Phương has a manufacturing business making wood furniture. She is requesting a loan to purchase more wood to make furniture to sell.

Phương is 48 years old and is married with 2 children. She is the leader of a 7-member group, the Nhóm 01 Thôn 2 Quảng Lưu group. Phương lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Phương's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Phương has been involved in this business for 9 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that affects her is the lack of capital.

In the future, Phương hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more wood to make furniture to sell.

loans.name: Carlito

texts.en: Carlito owns and manages his farm in Mahayag. He mastered the phasing of cropping and is now preparing for another season. He applied for a loan to pay for labor for land preparation. Carlito hopes to have a good yield and hopes to purchase a hauling truck for easy delivery.

loans.use: to pay for labor for land preparation

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana is 33 years old and married, with two children. With two children currently in school, Ana works very hard to provide for them.

Ana runs a general store in the Philippines and she has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy more stocks to sell in her general store.

Ana has been in this business for 13 years and she sells a variety of items, such as beer, soft drinks, shampoo, detergent soap, and canned goods. 

In the future, Ana would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Rosalie is 32 years old and has four children who are in school.

Rosalie has a food vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 4,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Rosalie has been in this business for two years. In the future, Rosalie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Elpedia

texts.en:
Elpedia is 54 years old and has 12 children. Elpedia is married and two of her children are still in school.

Elpedia is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Elpedia requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Elpedia has been in pig fattening for three years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

In the future, Elpedia would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Savet's Group

texts.en:
Savet, 41 years old, is a married mother of three children, one of whom is in school. She lives in the Ek Phnom district of Battambang province. The sources of her family’s income are from farming and selling fish.
 
This is the sixth loan for her with VisionFund, while the other one in her group is taking her first loan. The previous loans helped her to have better living conditions. She is now leading the group of two to take this loan with her portion to buy farming supplies to grow head cabbage. She hopes that she could earn more money to support her family’s living.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies to grow head cabbage

loans.name: Kimheang's Group

texts.en:
A mother of three children living in Battambang province, Kimheang is 44 years old. She helps support her family by farming potatoes and laboring on other farms.

Kimheang and her group loan partner, Laiheang, are applying for a 3,600,000 KHR loan through Kiva’s partner VisionFund Cambodia. This will be her fifth loan through Kiva’s partner VisionFund Cambodia, and she has fully repaid her past loans. She will spend her entire loan portion on fertilizer, seeds and plowing fees to support her farming.

Kimheang hopes to earn more money so she can buy more farmland.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds and pay for plowing fees

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
Violeta is 49 years old and married with five children. For the past year she has worked hard running a sari sari, or small general store in the Philippines to make a living.

Violeta has applied for a 5,000 PHP loan through Kiva’s partner NWTF to buy such items as personal care products, beverages, condiments, etc. to sell in her store. She hopes to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock for her sari sari.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is 45 years old and has six children. Rosalina is a married woman.

Rosalina is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Rosalina has been raising pigs for three years now, and has borrowed one time in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

In the future, Rosalina would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Annabelle works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell of dried fish business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from raising pigs.  Annabelle is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase more boxes of dried fish to sell in her market stall.

Annabelle has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more boxes of dried fish to sell in her market stall

loans.name: Elis Osmer

texts.es:
Elis tiene 21 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene un hijo, vive en casa familiar en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad dedicada a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales, ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de jornalería como peón agrícola, se dedica a este negocio desde hace 08 años y cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. Solicita préstamo para la compra de herramientas como son palanas, pico, martillos, etc. para implementar su negocio, esto con la finalidad de brindar mejores servicio a sus clientes lo que incrementará su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Elis is 21 years old, in a common law marriage, and has one son. He lives in a family home in a rural part of ​​the Oyotún district, located in the Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. It is a community dedicated to agriculture, trade and animal husbandry.

He is a day laborer in the agricultural industry. He has worked in this business for eight years and has good personal and work references in his district. He is requesting a loan to buy tools like shovels, a pickax, hammers, etc., to outfit his business. This will enable him to provide better service to his customers which will increase his income and thus improve quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: buy tools like shovels, a pickax, hammers, etc., to outfit his business.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en:
This is Raquel and she expresses her gratitude to all the lenders because her previous loan has helped her a lot in her business and in her personal needs. She used the loan to buy additional supplies of merchandise like footwear, clothing and other similar products, and she was also able to buy supplies and pay for the maintenance of her Piso-Net telecommunications business.

Raquel is now requesting another loan and this time in the amount of 25,000 PHP to purchase more clothing items that she needs to deliver to her customers. She expects that her new loan will help her increase her product inventory and likewise her profit. She also hopes that she will have enough savings for her family so she will have something to provide at times of emergency.

She meets up with her co-fellowship members* every week, to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God, which she studies.

*All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy additional supplies of clothing items for her business.

loans.name: Loan

texts.en:
Mr Loan works in agriculture, growing industrial crops.

Loan is 55 years old and he is married with four children. He lives and works in Nong Cong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Loan's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Loan has been involved in his business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Loan faces in his life is not having a hygienic latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

With his business profit, Loan hopes for his business to do well, for his family to be healthy and happy, and for his children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
La socia Nelly se dedica al negocio de crianza y venta de pollos y cuyes, la socia los pollos los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en las diferentes mercados, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los pollos. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar pollos y alimentos para los pollos y cuyes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Member Nelly works raising and selling chickens and Guinea pigs. She fattens the chickens and when they are grown she sells them at different markets. She has been in business for several years and things are going very well for her. Her dream is to open a store where she could sell her chickens. This member is requesting a loan in order to buy chickens, as well as feed for her chickens and Guinea pigs.

Nelly is happy with her loan and promises to comply with her payment terms.

loans.use: to buy chickens and animal feed.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
As a married parent of nine children, Myrna works hard to support her family.

She has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from pig fattening. Myrna is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy more vegetables to sell to her customers for her vegetable vending business.

Myrna has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell to her customers

loans.name: Romalyn

texts.en:
Romalyn is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. She is 24 years old and has one child in school.

Romalyn has a buy-and-sell beauty products business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 7,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy beauty products to sell, like lipstick.

Romalyn has been in this business for two years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy beauty products to sell, like lipstick.

loans.name: Na Tau 10 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hanh, 20, is a Thai ethnic woman who lives with her husband and his family, along with her son in a Thai ethnic traditional house. Like other households in the village, her family mainly relies on agricultural production for a living and cultivating rice is the activity that occupies most of their working time. Besides, they diversify cultivation and animal husbandry with plenty of activities, such as growing corn, cassava, edible canna, and raising pigs, chickens, and ducks. 

Mrs. Hanh has taken out a loan from the Anh Chi Em Program to buy chicks and food for the chickens to expand production. She hopes that her investment will go smoothly, so that she will gain a good income to improve the living conditions for her family. She dreams of a more abundant life for her family and a brighter future for her son. In the picture, she stands in the first line, at the first from the right.

loans.use: to buy chicks and food for the chickens to expand her production

loans.name: Mom's Group

texts.en:
Mom, 49, is a married woman from Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has seven children and two of them are in school. 

To make a living, Mom manages and operates a farming business. She grows rice and potatoes and she works for other farms for a fee. So far, she has been involved in this type of business for around 30 years. She is able to make an income of KHR 31,000 per day, on average. 

She is now applying for a Kiva loan, through VisionFund Cambodia, to buy fertilizer for her farm. Through this loan, she hopes she can earn more money and expand her farmland.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Teresa Lucia

texts.es: Teresa tiene 35 años de edad, ella tiene nacionalida colombiana pero ya son 11 años que vive en Ecuador. Teresa cuenta que se traslado de Colombia a Ecuador por motivo de que en su pais natal existen secuestros a las personas y muchos enfrentamientos entre de la guerrilla y los militares y que esto afecta a la poblecion en generar. Teresa junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos  llego a Ecuador hace 11 años y comenta que consiguio trabajo en una finca ganadera. Teresa y su esposo se dedican a trabajar de cuidadores de ganado y tambien tienen ganado de su propiedad. Teresa desea el credito para comprar una vaca ya que ordeñando la vaca y vendiendo la leche es como obtien sus ingresos. Teresa aspira comprar mas vacas y obtener mas ingresos para pagar los estudios de sus hijos que estan de las edades de 12, 15 y 18 años de edad y asisten al colegio.
texts.en:
Teresa is 35 years old. She is originally from Colombia, but has been living in Ecuador for eleven years now. Teresa says she moved from Colombia to Ecuador because of the kidnappings in her native country and because there were many confrontations between the guerrilla and the military. This affects the general population. 

Teresa arrived in Ecuador eleven years ago alongside her husband and their three children. She says she found work at a cattle ranch. Teresa and her husband work taking care of cattle and also have some cattle of their own now. Teresa wants this loan to buy a cow, because by milking it and selling its milk she will be able to make more income. Teresa means to purchase more cows so that she can make enough income to pay for her children's education. They are all in school and are now ages twelve, fifteen, and eighteen.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Kunthea's Group

texts.en: Kunthea, a 29-year-old, is the married mother of two dependent children - one of them is in school while the other one is too young to get in school. They live in Kampong Cham province. For eleven years the sources of her family income have been from rice farming and potato farming. She earns about 48,000 KHR per day on average. This is the fourth loan for her with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), while it is the other member's first loan. The previous loans helped her family to have enough money for consumption uses and gave her the ability to send her children to school. As the leader, she will use her portion tto pay for labor and the ploughing fee, and buy fertilizer. She hopes that she will earn more income and be able to keep sending her children to school.

loans.use: to pay for labor and the ploughing fee, and buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Nhóm 09 Thôn 3 Quảng Lưu Group

texts.en:
Tuyển works in agriculture raising pigs. She is applying for a loan to purchase more baby pigs to raise and sell in future. 

Tuyển is 36 years old and she is married with 3 children. She is the leader of a four-member group, the Nhóm 09 Thôn 3 Quảng Lưu solidarity group. 
Tuyển lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2014, Tuyển joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Tuyển has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Tuyển has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

In the future, Tuyển hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more baby pigs to raise and sell in future

loans.name: Las Mujeres Catarinecas Group

texts.es:
Olga (es la segunda del lado izquierdo de la fotografía) es una mujer de 30 años de edad, es soltera y tiene tres hijos de las edades entre dos y doce años, está linda familia vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Olga con el afán de obtener sus ingresos y mantener a su familia, se dedica  a la crianza de pollos, esta activada lo realiza ella desde hace cinco años, pero para poder mejorar sus ingresos también  da en alquiler unos cuartos que no ocupa con sus hijos.
Olga gracias al empeño que le pone a su labora logrado criar grandes  pollos y de buena calidad por lo que la gente lo busca mucho,  ahora se ve a la necesidad de comprar más pollos para abastecer las necesidades de la clientela, pero ella no tiene el capital necesario por tal razón junto a un grupo de personas solicita un crédito que lo invertirá en la compra de docenas de pollos y concentrados.
Olga sueña con poder mejorar sus ingresos con esta inversión para mejorar también su casa.
texts.en:
Olga (second from the left in the photo) is 30 years old, single, and has three children between 2 and 12 years old. This beautiful family lives in the Sololá community.

Olga raises chickens in order to bring in income and support her family. She has been working at this job for five years. She also rents rooms she and her children do not occupy for extra income.

Thanks to her dedication to her work, Olga grows big chickens of good quality that people look for a lot. Now she recognizes the need to buy more chickens to meet the demand of her clients, but she doesn't have the capital. For this reason she is requesting a loan along with a group of people who will buy dozens of chickens and concentrated feed.

Olga dreams of being able to improve her income with this loan in order to also improve her home.

loans.use: buy chickens and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Nhóm 11 Thôn Kim Sơn Xã Hoàng Giang Huyện Nông Cống Group

texts.en:
Mrs Hương works in agriculture raising poultry. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

Hương is 58 years old, and she is married with four children. Hương is the group leader of the Nhóm 11 thôn Kim Sơn xã Hoàng Giang huyện Nông Cống solidarity group, which consists of three members. 

In 2009, Hương joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hương has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Hương has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Hương faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hương hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre de 52 años de edad, es casado tiene una linda familia de cinco hijos de las edades entre 6 y 25 años de edad, esta linda familia vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Juan con el afán de generar sus ingresos y mantener a su familia trabaja como jornalero, él tiene ya 35 años de realizar esta labor, pero para mejorar sus ingresos se dedica también al cultivo de café.
Juan es un padre de familia que se preocupa por las necesidades de su familia, es por eso que ahora se ha dado cuenta que una de las necesidades más prioritarias es la remodelación del techo  de su casa, pero una de las dificultades que él tiene es que no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para poder comprar sus laminas por tal motivo solicita su prestamo.
El gran sueño de juan es que todos sus hijos sean grandes profesionales para que tengan mejores oportunidades  de superación.
texts.en:
Juan is 52 years old. He is married and has a beautiful family that includes five children ranging from six to 25 in age. He and his family live in a community in Sololá.

Juan works as a laborer in order to make a living and support his family. He has been doing this for 35 years now, but he also works growing coffee to supplement his income. As head of household, Juan worries about what his family needs. That is why he has now realized that one of their most pressing needs is to replace the roof over their home. However, this is difficult because he doesn't have enough money to buy the sheet metal. This is the reason why he is requesting a loan.

Juan's big dream is for all of his children to have successful professional careers so that they can have better opportunities to improve themselves.

loans.use: to buy sheets of metal to replace the roof of his house.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
La socia Nancy  se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza de pollos y también tiene un kiosco escolar, la socia por medio de estos dos negocios saca adelante a su familia, el sueño de la socia es tener un local más grande para que pueda vender los pollos. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar pollos y alimentos para los pollos.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Nancy continues with her business of raising chickens, she also has a school kiosk. Through these businesses the member is able to get her family ahead.  Her dream is to have a bigger location where she can sell the chickens.  She is requesting a loan to buy chickens and feed.

She is happy for the loan and commits to make the loan repayments.

loans.use: to buy chickens and feed.

loans.name: Pablo David

texts.es:
Pablo tiene 42 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa de familiares junto a sus hijos, suegra y esposa en el distrito de Zaña, una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan y dulces, realiza esta actividad desde hace 15 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de insumos para su panadería como son manteca, azúcar y harina, esto le permitirá generar mayores ingresos y una mejora de calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Pablo is 42 years old and is in a common-law relationship. He lives in the house of relatives along with his children, his mother in law and his wife in the district of Zaña, a community that earns a living in business, agriculture and breeding animals. It is located in the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru.

He earns a living making and selling bread and sweets. He has been doing this for 15 years and so he has experience in this business and has good personal and work references in the district. The loan will be used to buy supplies for his bakery such as butter, sugar and flour. This will allow him to earn a better income and improve the quality of life of his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his bakery such as butter, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Jaime Abraham

texts.es: Jaime de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, el trabaja desde hace 3 años en una comercial como empleado y con lo q obtiene de su trabajo es como logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el quiere mejorar su vivienda colocando piso cerámico pero como no tiene de suficiente capital está solicitando un crédito para la compra de cemento, cerámica, arena y pago de mano de obra, así el y su familia puedan vivir más cómodos  y en lo limpio.
texts.en:
Jaime is 34 and lives in his own home with his three children. He has been employed by a business for three years and through this work has been able to cover some household expenses. 

He wants to improve his home by laying a tile floor but because he does not have the sufficient capital he is asking for a loan to buy cement, tiles and sand, and to pay the workforce. This will allow him and his family to live more comfortably in a clean environment.

loans.use: to buy cement, tiles and sand, and to pay workforce costs

loans.name: Alona

texts.en:
Alona is a 42-year-old married mother of six children, all of whom are in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

For three years, Alona has run a general store in the Philippines that sells a variety of items such as canned goods, noodles, vinegar, soy sauce, biscuits, candies and other groceries. She has requested a PHP 8000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell including canned goods, home care products and beverages.

In the future, Alona would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as canned goods, home  care products, beverages, and other groceries

loans.name: Jessica Alexandra

texts.es: Alexandra es madre soltera, ella vive con su hija de 6 años,  sus padres y 3 hermanos, Alexandra se se dedica desde muy joven a trabajar al jornal y a la criana de animales menores. Alexandra  necesita el dinero del credito para invertirlo en la compra de chanchos, Alexandra se dedica a su negocio y trabaja de jornalera para tener los ingresos para su hija ya que esta asistiendo a la escuela y ademas el padre de la niña no le apoya en nada.
texts.en: Alexandra is a single mother who lives with her 6 year old daughter, her parents and 3 siblings.  Alexandra has been working as a day laborer since she was very young raising small animals.  Alexandra needs the money from the loan to invest in the purchase of pigs.  Alexandra tends to her business and works as a day laborer to have the income for her daughter who is already going to school, the girl’s father does not support her.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Hati

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of Ruma’s agents, Hati. Hati lives in Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. She lives there with her husband and her only son. Hati owns a stall that sells mobile airtime credits to her community. She decided to join Ruma because she already heard before that Ruma has the best service and system. Her community sees her as an informed mobile provider. As a woman, Hati realized that she has to help her husband to increase their income.

As the business grows, Hati needs additional capital and is seeking a working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits to her community, so her community can easily connect with their loved ones, no matter how far they are apart. Hati’s goal towards Ruma in the near future is to serve as an e-commerce business for her community, via Ruma’s latest product called Mapan.

As seen in the photo, Hati is the one who is standing. She is thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to purchase additional prepaid airtime credits to sell to community members who want to use mobile phones to connect with loved ones.

loans.name: Caridad

texts.en:
